title: Next Year's April Fools...
body: should be called Lux Day. Every sound in the game will be Lux laughing. The music will be the DeLux jam. Did I mention that every sound effect is Lux's laugh? No? Well, every sound effect (whether it be from killing creeps or Luden's Echo or champions taunting) will be Lux's laugh. Whenever someone is killed, instead of "An Ally has been slain," we get "AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA." Plis rito. Make this happen.
